name: com.gamebuster.gbsdk
description: Unity WebGL bridge for GBSDK - A lightweight, zero-dependency in-game ads SDK with VAST 4.x + Google IMA HTML5 support. Provides 5 simple methods for easy integration: init, showInterstitial, showRewarded, gameStarted, gameEnded.

samples.description: Complete example showing how to integrate GBSDK into your Unity WebGL game
